newsitem.title: USA: Fed adds reserves viua $1.5 billion customer rps.
newsitem.headline: Fed adds reserves viua $1.5 billion customer rps.

text.p: The Federal Reserve added temporary reserves to the banking system on Thursday through $1.5 billion in customer repurchase agreements, a Fed spokesman confirmed.

Analysts had mainly expected the Fed to refrain from action, noting that the Fed had added temporary reserves to the banking system on Wednesday through eight-day fixed system repurchase agreements. But they had cited a chance of a reserve addition through customer repurchase agreements.
